column3: as they cooked it half way after we ordered it
column4: and then the rest of the way once we were seated.  They looked rather wet
column5: which disappointed us since we had ordered our pies well done.  But we started off on the classic and found a disk of sausage beneath the tomato and cheese layer - yes
column6: that would keep the moisture from dissipating.  But we asked if the other pie could be run through the oven to dry it out some.
